items.headline: Apple’s iPhone events have been unimpressive lately. Will this year be the exception?

items.headline: From bad to worse? Another big jobs report is coming up — and it probably won’t look good either.
items.summary_en: Don’t look now, but another big jobs report is coming out in just a few more days — one that most people have never heard of. And the news probably won’t be good.

items.headline: Kenvue fights back against RFK Jr.’s Tylenol safety concerns as its stock tumbles
items.summary_en: Kenvue rushed to the defense of Tylenol, but the stock still suffered a record selloff on news that RFK Jr. will release a report linking the use of acetaminophen during pregnancy to autism.

items.headline: How you can still get a refund for a delayed or canceled flight even as Trump scraps Biden’s airline compensation proposal
items.summary_en: The Trump administration this week said it will reverse plans to require airlines to compensate passengers for lengthy delays and cancellations, a move consumer advocates say is likely the first of many to weaken protections for travelers.
